Package ev3dev.hardware.display

Class LinuxFramebuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.display.LinuxFramebuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JavaFramebuffer, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitFramebuffer, RGBFramebuffer
    public abstract class LinuxFramebuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaFramebuffer

    Linux Java2D framebuffer.

    Since:
    2.4.7
